name: Orchids Resort

reviews.text: Gorgeous little resort and excellent value. Staff are 24 hours and there is a really friendly, family vibe about the place. As another reviewer has said, very safe for single female travellers as the staff get to know you early on and watch your room for you and greet you all the time. Very decent rates and nice to stay in an authentic style accommodation.
reviews.title: Really friendly resort, excellent value
great well equipped comfortable and cool
reviews.text: Staff are also very helpful and able to recommend tours and activities at discounted rates. I took the Alan B fun tour island hopping for a day. Exceptional value and a fun day out. Also used Blue Mango Diving to do my PADI Open water as recommended by Orchids. Anything you are looking to do, they can offer advice and organise things for you.

The owners are fantastic and offer a really personal service. They make an effort to introduce themselves to you and to make sure you are enjoying your stay. It would be very difficult not to enjoy it here! Lovely peaceful location set in little gardens just south of Boat Station 3. Approx 2 mins walk to the stunning white beach, along which are countless restaurants, shops etc. Very relaxing and much calmer than the busier Station 2, with a lot less vendors.
reviews.title: Great bungalows and outstanding staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Drinks are reasonably priced and there are plenty of little shops nearby for anything else you may need. Cable TV in rooms had a surprising amount of channels in many different languages, not that I watched much tv, but nice to have .... Showers are better than you would think with hot and cold water at all times as they have generators for any power outtages.
reviews.title: Wonderful resort
orchid resort, boracay..6 - 12 july 2009
reviews.text: Thoroughly recommend this place, I really enjoyed my time here.

No doubt.Orchids is a good choice if you are a "budget traveler".We stayed there for a week.Orchids like a second home in philippine for us.Staff not only friendly but sweet also.Manager Mr.Jr and Mr.Lynn gave us very great help when we met a little problem.Especially Mr.Jr,thank you very much and I miss you already.
reviews.title: sweet Orchids

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me ad my girlfreind did a 3 month backpacking trip around the whole of the Philippines and thisis one of the best hostels we stayed in. We knew Boracay would be expensive compared to other places but after calling and saying the web price we got 5 nights for 750 pesos. It was a massive very comfortable room, and we had 24 hour internet for 50 pesos a day. The staff were very accomodating, and it was just out the way of the big bars but you could walk there in minutes. Great place !
reviews.title: One of the best low costs hostels in the Philippines

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in one of the Orchids Villas for one week. It was our first trip to Boracay and we were very pleased about the nice welcome starting at the pick-up from airport by Orchids Staff.
reviews.title: Very nice week in Boracay

reviews.text: The Villas are located on a hill behind the Orchids Resort. But you can reach the beach in round about 3 minutes walk on a small lighted path between the resorts. The location is very calm and sourrounded by nature. The villa's look is in native style. From the torch of the villa you have a good view over the location (beach cannot be seen because it's covered by trees). The garden of the villas is very nice and cultivated with orchids and other plants.
reviews.title: Very pleasureable stay

reviews.text: The villas itself are very clean and there is a lot of space inside. The kitchen with big fridge is good equipped and we cooked very often some local delights that we bought at the market in the village, just a fwe minutes walk away.
reviews.title: my stay at the Orchids villas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is also a common washing area located next to the villas.
reviews.title: The very best Resort

reviews.text: In Feb 2009 I stayed in this cosy and beatiful and very affordable place for the second time. I can totaly assure everyone that this hotel is a good choice in it's category, so if you are not looking for something very elegant/luxurious, this can be a good place to stay in. This place is affordable, clean, and it has very friendly and flexible staff. It is located very close to the seaside, around 2 mins walking or even less but still you can have a bit more privacy here than staying in one of the hotels located exactly on the seaside. I only had two little negative experiences: the water pressure was sometimes not the best in the showers, I was a bit missing the day-by-day cleaning service from the room, but the rest was perfectly fine for me.
reviews.title: Cosy place with friendly staff

reviews.text: The Orchids staff was great right from the start. Lynn answered all of my e-mails in a very timely manner. Orchids has a staff member come and pick you up at the port. The resort is very quiet and tucked away off the beach so you can get a good night sleep. We stayed in a fan room and we were kept very cool. The decor of the resort was really fun and beachy. I really liked all the shell lamps. Our room was really clean and the staff was very friendly. We went on a snorkel trip and we were not satisfied with the experience so Lynn got half of our money refunded and gave us all of our breakfasts for free! The Orchids staff is committed to making your stay an enjoyable one. Everything is very affordable: the rooms, the food, and we even had our laundry done. It was wonderful! We will definitely be back at Orchids.
reviews.title: Relaxing, affordable, and very enjoyable.

reviews.text: We stayed at Orchids for 5D/4N at one of their cottages. The room is spacious for 2 persons, with good air circulation. Breakfast is nicely served and the workers there are friendly. The resort is located within a short walking distance from the White Beach. For those who enjoyed beautiful flora and native-style living experience, just stay there!
reviews.title: Peace and Tranquility

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Orchids is a great friendly place for travellers on a budget or for holiday makers who want a more native experience of white beach rather than going for the typical non-descript concrete room.
reviews.title: Native experience on white beach

reviews.text: We found the service was better than expected, we were met at the pier by a staff member even though we didn't ask who took us there, and back when we left. We were offered free breakfast everyday! They also helped us with arranging transport to Kalibo when we left.
reviews.title: It's such a peaceful place. very Relaxing and the Staff are accomodating

description: One of the island's most attractive, low-budget resorts, the ORCHIDS RESORT features native rooms and cottages made of native bamboo and nipa. And now equipped with Wireless Internet Connection. ORCHIDS RESORT is ideally located less than a minute walk to the beautiful Boracay Island "white" beach.
